price: Haƙĩƙa Allah ya faralta muku warware* rantsuwõyinku, kuma Allah ne Mataimakinku kuma shĩ ne Masani, Mai hikima.
arabic: قَدۡ فَرَضَ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمۡ تَحِلَّةَ أَيۡمَٰنِكُمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ مَوۡلَىٰكُمۡۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
footnotes: * An rubũta yadda ake warware rantsuwa da kaffãra wadda aka ambata a cikin sũra ta 5, ãyã ta 89. Anã kaffãrar rantsuwa da ciyar da miskĩnai gõma daga matsakaicin abinci, mũdu biyu ga kõwane, kõ tufãtar da su tufar da za ta ishe su salla, idan bai sãmu ba, ya yi azumin kwãna uku.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qad faraḍa al-lahu lakum taḥillata aymānikum wal-lahu mawlākum wahuwa al-ʿalīmu al-ḥakīmu
